cards.flavor: It's never good to walk into an ambush, but with the right spell you might walk out again.
cards.name: Battlewise Valor
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor:
"It is hope, hooved and winged."
—Cymede, queen of Akros
cards.name: Cavalry Pegasus
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Celestial Archon
cards.text:
Bestow {5}{W}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying, first strike
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying and first strike.

cards.name: Chained to the Rocks
cards.text:
Enchant Mountain you control
When Chained to the Rocks enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Chained to the Rocks leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

cards.flavor:
"Training and studies aid a soldier in meager amounts. The gods do the rest."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis
cards.name: Chosen by Heliod
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Chosen by Heliod enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.

cards.flavor:
"The people of Akros must learn from our leonin adversaries. If we match their staunch ferocity with our superior faith, we cannot fail."
—Cymede, queen of Akros
cards.name: Dauntless Onslaught
cards.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The awards and medals of polis-dwellers mean nothing to griffins, but they repay acts of generosity.
cards.name: Decorated Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

cards.flavor: The last thing to go through the cyclops's mind was a twelve-ton block of marble.
cards.name: Divine Verdict
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion
cards.text:
+1: Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

cards.flavor: "When you threaten the sanctity of the polis, you insult Ephara herself. If she doesn't smite you, I will."
cards.name: Ephara's Warden
cards.text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.name: Evangel of Heliod
cards.text: When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, put a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

cards.flavor: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."
cards.name: Fabled Hero
cards.text:
Double strike
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fabled Hero, put a +1/+1 counter on Fabled Hero.

cards.name: Favored Hoplite
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Favored Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Favored Hoplite and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

cards.name: Gift of Immortality
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Return Gift of Immortality to the battlefield attached to that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: No foe is more hated than the former friend.
cards.name: Glare of Heresy
cards.text: Exile target white permanent.

cards.flavor: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.
cards.name: Gods Willing
cards.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Heliod, God of the Sun
cards.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white is less than five, Heliod isn't a creature. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
Other creatures you control have vigilance.
{2}{W}{W}: Put a 2/1 white Cleric enchantment creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Heliod's Emissary
cards.text:
Bestow {6}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Whenever Heliod's Emissary or enchanted creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

cards.name: Hopeful Eidolon
cards.text:
Bestow {3}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

cards.name: Hundred-Handed One
cards.text:
Vigilance
{3}{W}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Hundred-Handed One is monstrous, it has reach and can block an additional ninety-nine creatures each combat.

cards.flavor: "The best lessons are not the ones I teach. They are the ones the pupils realize for themselves."
cards.name: Lagonna-Band Elder
cards.text: When Lagonna-Band Elder enters the battlefield, if you control an enchantment, you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: In time, all things turn to dust. Some things just take less time.
cards.name: Last Breath
cards.text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

cards.flavor: Formerly oppressed by the polis of Meletis, leonin occasionally "mistake" their old enemies for game.
cards.name: Leonin Snarecaster
cards.text: When Leonin Snarecaster enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

cards.name: Observant Alseid
cards.text:
Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Vigilance
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

cards.name: Ordeal of Heliod
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

cards.flavor: His soldiers etch his words on the insides of their shields, their inspiration always in sight during battle.
cards.name: Phalanx Leader
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Phalanx Leader, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.flavor: The works of one god last only as long as the patience of another.
cards.name: Ray of Dissolution
cards.text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: She asks pointed questions of the dead who wait for Athreos, learning of life from those who are about to leave it.
cards.name: Scholar of Athreos
cards.text: {2}{B}: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.flavor: "Your god teaches you only how to kill. Karametra teaches me to defend what I hold dear. That is why I will prevail."
cards.name: Setessan Battle Priest
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Battle Priest, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Most griffins must be caught and broken into the service of the polis. Not so in Setessa, where they volunteer.
cards.name: Setessan Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{G}{G}: Setessan Griffin gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

cards.flavor:
On the fourth day they passed through a forest of immense stacked stones. Althemone, youngest of the companions, called these pillars the work of a god, but the Champion knew better. She quickened her pace.
—The Theriad
cards.name: Silent Artisan

cards.flavor: "I hear the gods' voices in my dreams each night, and I offer bloody trophies on their altars each day."
cards.name: Soldier of the Pantheon
cards.text:
Protection from multicolored
Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Legend speaks of the Sun Spear, the mighty weapon that can strike any point in Theros, even the depths of the Underworld.
cards.name: Spear of Heliod
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

cards.flavor:
The Champion and the philosopher Olexa returned from the opposing camp at dusk. Behind them, the enemy raised sail and departed, breaking the siege. When asked what the two had done, the Champion replied, "We spoke to them."
—The Theriad
cards.name: Traveling Philosopher
Vanquish the Foul
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: Trust is the only bridle a pegasus will accept.
cards.name: Wingsteed Rider
cards.text:
Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wingsteed Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on Wingsteed Rider.

cards.flavor:
It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it.
—The Theriad
cards.name: Yoked Ox

cards.flavor:
"Why pray to the gods, who feed on your worship? Dissolve your illusions and see the true nature of things."
—Xenagos, the Reveler
cards.name: Annul
cards.text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

cards.name: Aqueous Form
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Artisan of Forms
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Artisan of Forms, you may have Artisan of Forms become a copy of target creature and gain this ability.

cards.flavor:
"Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them."
—Callaphe the mariner
cards.name: Benthic Giant
cards.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.
cards.name: Bident of Thassa
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

cards.flavor: Don't try to ride this steed unless you've got gills too.
cards.name: Breaching Hippocamp
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Breaching Hippocamp enters the battlefield, untap another target creature you control.

cards.flavor: Seeing a chimera overhead foretells good fortune, but only because seeing one any closer foretells dismemberment.
cards.name: Coastline Chimera
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Coastline Chimera can block an additional creature this turn.

cards.flavor: He calls upon both the currents in the sea and the current in the clouds.
cards.name: Crackling Triton
cards.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Crackling Triton: Crackling Triton deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.
cards.name: Curse of the Swine
cards.text: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller puts a 2/2 green Boar creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"
cards.name: Dissolve
cards.text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: The tale of her life was already written, but that didn't mean she could predict the ending.
cards.name: Fate Foretold
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Fate Foretold enters the battlefield, draw a card.
When enchanted creature dies, its controller draws a card.

cards.flavor:
"You dryfolk must take the air for granted. You constantly insist on wasting it."
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa
cards.name: Gainsay
cards.text: Counter target blue spell.

cards.flavor: When the sea god Thassa wishes to speak with a mortal, she does not issue a summons or grant a vision requesting a visit. The sea simply brings her guest before her.
cards.name: Griptide
cards.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Horizon Scholar
cards.text:
Flying
When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: Even those who leave the labyrinth never escape it, forever dreaming of their time trapped within.
cards.name: Lost in a Labyrinth
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Master of Waves
cards.text:
Protection from red
Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, put a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

cards.flavor: "Every object has an echo in the Æther beyond the world. Every idea has a shadow that can be brought to light."
cards.name: Meletis Charlatan
cards.text: {2}{U}, {T}: The controller of target instant or sorcery spell copies it. That player may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor:
"It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?"
—Perisophia the philosopher
cards.name: Mnemonic Wall
cards.text:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Nimbus Naiad
cards.text:
Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

cards.flavor: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.
cards.name: Omenspeaker
cards.text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Ordeal of Thassa
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa, draw two cards.

cards.name: Prescient Chimera
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Prognostic Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it.
Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor:
"What has neither mouth nor throat, yet swallows captain, crew, and boat?"
—Sphinx's riddle
cards.name: Sea God's Revenge
cards.text: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Sealock Monster
cards.text:
Sealock Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{5}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Sealock Monster becomes monstrous, target land becomes an Island in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Shipbreaker Kraken
cards.text:
{6}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Shipbreaker Kraken becomes monstrous, tap up to four target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as you control Shipbreaker Kraken.

cards.flavor: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.
cards.name: Stymied Hopes
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor:
"The most enlightened mages create beauty from violence."
—Medomai the Ageless
cards.name: Swan Song
cards.text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller puts a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Thassa, God of the Sea
cards.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, Thassa isn't a creature. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
{1}{U}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor:
"Was this gift cast adrift for any to find, or did Thassa guide the currents to bring it to me alone?"
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa
cards.name: Thassa's Bounty
cards.text: Draw three cards. Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Thassa's Emissary
cards.text:
Bestow {5}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Whenever Thassa's Emissary or enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

cards.flavor: "Thassa has blessed me with power and insight. I am careful not to disappoint her."
cards.name: Triton Fortune Hunter
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Fortune Hunter, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
At sunrise, the Champion and her companions awoke to find their supplies gone and Brygus, their sentry, dead. Carefully arranged piles of ornamental shells gave a clear warning: go no further.
—The Theriad
cards.name: Triton Shorethief
Triton Tactics
cards.text: Up to two target creatures each get +0/+3 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each creature that was blocked by one of those creatures this turn and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor:
"Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds."
—Thrasios, triton hero
cards.name: Vaporkin
cards.text:
Flying
Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.

cards.flavor: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.
cards.name: Voyage's End
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Wavecrash Triton
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wavecrash Triton, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Abhorrent Overlord
cards.text:
Flying
When Abhorrent Overlord enters the battlefield, put a number of 1/1 black Harpy creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

cards.flavor: "You are breathing borrowed air."
cards.name: Agent of the Fates
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent of the Fates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: He killed out of hate, so now only hate sustains him. He sought immortality, so the gods gave it to him.
cards.name: Asphodel Wanderer
cards.text: {2}{B}: Regenerate Asphodel Wanderer.

cards.name: Baleful Eidolon
cards.text:
Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.

cards.flavor: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.
cards.name: Blood-Toll Harpy
cards.text:
Flying
When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Death is not a certainty. Erebos determines when a mortal's time is up."
—Iadorna, death priest of Erebos
cards.name: Boon of Erebos
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Cavern Lampad
cards.text:
Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has intimidate.

cards.flavor: "Our ambition drives us forward. Together we will claim what is ours, no matter who holds it."
cards.name: Cutthroat Maneuver
cards.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"You're just like me: ruthless, cunning, and ambitious. Obviously you're a threat."
—Basarios the Blade
cards.name: Dark Betrayal
cards.text: Destroy target black creature.

cards.name: Disciple of Phenax
cards.text: When Disciple of Phenax enters the battlefield, target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to your devotion to black. You choose one of them. That player discards that card. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

cards.name: Erebos, God of the Dead
cards.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black is less than five, Erebos isn't a creature. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
Your opponents can't gain life.
{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

cards.name: Erebos's Emissary
cards.text:
Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Discard a creature card: Erebos's Emissary gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If Erebos's Emissary is an Aura, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn instead.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

cards.flavor:
With spear held high, the Champion came to meet Thyrogog of the Ashlands, who wore the old king's skin as a cloak and fed on the flesh of innocents. The foul minotaur raised the great axe called Goremaster and charged.
—The Theriad
cards.name: Felhide Minotaur

cards.flavor: More disturbing than the unknown is a distortion of the familiar.
cards.name: Fleshmad Steed
cards.text: Whenever another creature dies, tap Fleshmad Steed.

cards.name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
cards.text: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

cards.flavor: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.
cards.name: Hero's Downfall
cards.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

cards.name: Hythonia the Cruel
cards.text:
Deathtouch
{6}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Hythonia the Cruel becomes monstrous, destroy all non-Gorgon creatures.

cards.flavor: Gold coin, battered helmet, broken wrist bone—all have the same value in the eyes of a harpy.
cards.name: Insatiable Harpy
cards.text: Flying, lifelink

cards.name: Keepsake Gorgon
cards.text:
Deathtouch
{5}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Keepsake Gorgon becomes monstrous, destroy target non-Gorgon creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor:
"No matter who their fickle hearts worship, all mortals belong to one god in the end."
—Iadorna, death priest of Erebos
cards.name: Lash of the Whip
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Loathsome Catoblepas
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Loathsome Catoblepas must be blocked this turn if able.
When Loathsome Catoblepas dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The Returned have no memory of the Underworld or of their former lives. The golden masks they wear are the last gifts of the selves they left behind.
cards.name: March of the Returned
cards.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Mogis's Marauder
cards.text: When Mogis's Marauder enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures each gain intimidate and haste until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it. Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

cards.name: Nighthowler
cards.text:
Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Nighthowler and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

cards.name: Ordeal of Erebos
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos, target player discards two cards.

cards.flavor:
"The venom cleanses the sickness from your body, but it will not be pleasant, and you may not survive. Pharika's blessings are fickle."
—Solon, acolyte of Pharika
cards.name: Pharika's Cure
cards.text: Pharika's Cure deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.
cards.name: Read the Bones
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Rescue from the Underworld
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Rescue from the Underworld, sacrifice a creature.
Choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card and the sacrificed card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rescue from the Underworld.

cards.flavor: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.
cards.name: Returned Centaur
cards.text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.flavor: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.
cards.name: Returned Phalanx
cards.text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

cards.flavor: To members of the cult of Erebos, gold-infused tattoos symbolize the inevitable grasp of the god of death.
cards.name: Scourgemark
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Scourgemark enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.

cards.flavor: Conspirators poisoned the oracle not because her visions were wrong, but because they were right.
cards.name: Sip of Hemlock
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"Knowledge is such a burden. Release it. Release all your fears to me."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver
cards.name: Thoughtseize
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Tormented Hero
cards.text:
Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.flavor:
"I could heal a snakebite. Looks like you got bitten by a constellation."
—Aescalos, healer of Pharika
cards.name: Viper's Kiss
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

cards.name: Whip of Erebos
cards.text:
Creatures you control have lifelink.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.flavor: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.
cards.name: Akroan Crusader
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, put a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.
cards.name: Anger of the Gods
cards.text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.
cards.name: Arena Athlete
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

cards.flavor:
"You have led us to triumph over the forces of Mogis!" said Brygus the Brave, clapping the Champion on the back.
The Champion wiped the sweat and blood from her brow.
"I count eight graves," she said. "Too many to call this a victory."
—The Theriad
cards.name: Borderland Minotaur

cards.flavor:
"Defeating the Meletians was not so difficult. I needed only to move a mountain."
—Eocles, oracle of Purphoros
cards.name: Boulderfall
cards.text: Boulderfall deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

cards.flavor: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.
cards.name: Coordinated Assault
cards.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The temple has been rededicated. It belongs to Mogis now."
—Rastos, disciple of Mogis
cards.name: Deathbellow Raider
cards.text:
Deathbellow Raider attacks each turn if able.
{2}{B}: Regenerate Deathbellow Raider.

cards.flavor:
"When fire is shackled to candle and torch, subjected to insignificance, it finds a way to lash out at its masters."
—Vala, disciple of Purphoros
cards.name: Demolish
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

cards.name: Dragon Mantle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

cards.name: Ember Swallower
cards.text:
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Ember Swallower becomes monstrous, each player sacrifices three lands.

cards.name: Fanatic of Mogis
cards.text: When Fanatic of Mogis enters the battlefield, it deals damage to each opponent equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

cards.flavor: Attending a satyr revel requires a high tolerance for pain.
cards.name: Firedrinker Satyr
cards.text:
Whenever Firedrinker Satyr is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
{1}{R}: Firedrinker Satyr gets +1/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

cards.flavor: "I see your future, mantled in ash."
cards.name: Flamespeaker Adept
cards.text: Whenever you scry, Flamespeaker Adept gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: All the world is Purphoros's anvil.
cards.name: Hammer of Purphoros
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Put a 3/3 colorless Golem enchantment artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.
cards.name: Ill-Tempered Cyclops
cards.text:
Trample
{5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

cards.flavor: "It used to be a lair. Now it's just a tunnel."
cards.name: Labyrinth Champion
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Labyrinth Champion, Labyrinth Champion deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"The hand of Keranos can be seen in every rumbling storm cloud. Best not to stand where he points."
—Rakleia of Shrine Peak
cards.name: Lightning Strike
cards.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Magma Jet
cards.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor:
"He outran arrows. He outran even the archers' insults."
—Bayma, storyteller of Lagonna Band
cards.name: Messenger's Speed
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample and haste.

cards.flavor:
"Their only dreams are of full stomachs."
—Kleon the Iron-Booted
cards.name: Minotaur Skullcleaver
cards.text:
Haste
When Minotaur Skullcleaver enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Ordeal of Purphoros
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"Early olive buds? A good omen. Flock of crows? Not so good. Mountain exploding? Bad. Very, very bad."
—Hira, street oracle
cards.name: Peak Eruption
cards.text: Destroy target Mountain. Peak Eruption deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

cards.name: Portent of Betrayal
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: "Even my last breath will be a blow struck for Iroas."
cards.name: Priest of Iroas
cards.text: {3}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of Iroas: Destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Purphoros, God of the Forge
cards.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Purphoros's Emissary
cards.text:
Bestow {6}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has menace.

cards.name: Rage of Purphoros
cards.text: Rage of Purphoros deals 4 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor:
"I see a spark of pure rage. Soon that spark will spread from the depths of Kragma. Soon its fire will engulf the polis."
—Hira, street oracle
cards.name: Rageblood Shaman
cards.text:
Trample
Other Minotaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

cards.flavor: A satyr is bound by nothing—not home, not family, not loyalty.
cards.name: Satyr Rambler
cards.text: Trample

cards.flavor: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.
cards.name: Spark Jolt
cards.text: Spark Jolt deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Spearpoint Oread

Bestow {5}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
First strike

cards.name: Stoneshock Giant
cards.text:
{6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

cards.name: Stormbreath Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, haste, protection from white
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stormbreath Dragon becomes monstrous, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

cards.flavor: There is no gift more precious or more perilous than fire.
cards.name: Titan of Eternal Fire
cards.text: Each Human creature you control has "{R}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

cards.name: Titan's Strength
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: The left head keeps the right head starved as motivation to track new prey.
cards.name: Two-Headed Cerberus
cards.text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

cards.flavor: "You can tell something's really valuable by the sound it makes when you slam your staff into it."
cards.name: Wild Celebrants
cards.text: When Wild Celebrants enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor: The light in the woods just before dawn reveals a glimmering network of branches, roots, and spiderwebs. The acolytes of Kruphix walk this lattice unseen.
cards.name: Agent of Horizons
cards.text: {2}{U}: Agent of Horizons can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: The warriors she leads can rarely keep pace with her, and neither can the tales.
cards.name: Anthousa, Setessan Hero
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anthousa, Setessan Hero, up to three target lands you control each become 2/2 Warrior creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

cards.name: Arbor Colossus
cards.text:
Reach
{3}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Arbor Colossus becomes monstrous, destroy target creature with flying an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: Some seers read bones or entrails. Others just like to break things.
cards.name: Artisan's Sorrow
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Boon Satyr
cards.text:
Flash
Bestow {3}{G}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +4/+2.

cards.name: Bow of Nylea
cards.text:
Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch.
{1}{G}, {T}: Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Bow of Nylea deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.
• You gain 3 life.
• Put up to four target cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor:
"A herd is only as strong as its weakest. Our weakest just killed his third minotaur raider—today."
—Braulios of Pheres Band
cards.name: Centaur Battlemaster
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Centaur Battlemaster, put three +1/+1 counters on Centaur Battlemaster.

cards.flavor: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.
cards.name: Commune with the Gods
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: The defenders said not a word. Their shields, spears, and stances were warning enough.
cards.name: Defend the Hearth
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.

cards.flavor:
"Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?"
—Kleon the Iron-Booted
cards.name: Fade into Antiquity
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.
cards.name: Feral Invocation
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

cards.flavor:
"A grudge is a tattoo worn on the inside."
—Setessan warrior saying
cards.name: Hunt the Hunter
cards.text: Target green creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target green creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: "The wilds are a garden tended by divine hands."
cards.name: Karametra's Acolyte
cards.text: {T}: Add an amount of {G} to your mana pool equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

cards.text:
Bestow {3}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Reach

cards.name: Mistcutter Hydra

Mistcutter Hydra can't be countered.

Mistcutter Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Nemesis of Mortals
cards.text:
Nemesis of Mortals costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
{7}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 5. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature card in your graveyard. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put five +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

cards.flavor: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.
cards.name: Nessian Asp
cards.text:
Reach
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

cards.flavor:
Khestes the Adamant, the Champion's closest ally among the centaurs, took one stone to his shoulder and another to his flank. He held his stride and his aim, and let fly the arrow that killed the giant Grinthax.
—The Theriad
cards.name: Nessian Courser
Nylea, God of the Hunt
cards.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green is less than five, Nylea isn't a creature. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
Other creatures you control have trample.
{3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Nylea's Disciple
cards.text: When Nylea's Disciple enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

cards.name: Nylea's Emissary
cards.text:
Bestow {5}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Trample
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.

cards.name: Nylea's Presence
cards.text:
Enchant land
When Nylea's Presence enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land is every basic land type in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Ordeal of Nylea
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"Poets speak of your unrivaled speed," the Champion said to the assembled centaurs, "but it is plain to see that your true strength lies in your unwavering loyalty to one another."
—The Theriad
cards.name: Pheres-Band Centaurs
Polukranos, World Eater
cards.text:
{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

cards.name: Reverent Hunter
cards.text: When Reverent Hunter enters the battlefield, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

cards.flavor: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."
cards.name: Satyr Hedonist
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Satyr Hedonist: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor:
"When I asked my commander the reward for killing that prancing nuisance, he told me, ‘None! I want to kill him myself!'"
—Phrogas, soldier of Akros
cards.name: Satyr Piper
cards.text: {3}{G}: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

cards.flavor:
"I thought its back was turned!"
"A centaur has two backs!"
cards.name: Savage Surge
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

cards.flavor:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave
cards.name: Sedge Scorpion
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor:
"Enemies of the wood! Your presence here is a slap in Nylea's face. Do not be surprised if she slaps back."
—Telphe, druid of Nylea
cards.name: Shredding Winds
cards.text: Shredding Winds deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.

cards.flavor: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.
cards.name: Staunch-Hearted Warrior
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.

cards.flavor: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.
cards.name: Sylvan Caryatid
cards.text:
Defender, hexproof
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Time to Feed
cards.text: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.flavor: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."
cards.name: Voyaging Satyr
cards.text: {T}: Untap target land.

cards.flavor:
"With a diet of hydras, giants, and massive serpents, anything would get that big."
—Corisande, Setessan hunter
cards.name: Vulpine Goliath
cards.text: Trample

cards.flavor:
"Let each challenge make you a better warrior."
—Anthousa of Setessa
cards.name: Warriors' Lesson
cards.text: Until end of turn, up to two target creatures you control each gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

cards.flavor: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."
cards.name: Akroan Hoplite
cards.text: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.

cards.flavor: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.
cards.name: Anax and Cymede
cards.text:
First strike, vigilance
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.
cards.name: Ashen Rider
cards.text:
Flying
When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.

cards.name: Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver
cards.text:
+2: Exile the top three cards of target opponent's library.
−X: Put a creature card with converted mana cost X exiled with Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a Nightmare in addition to its other types.
−10: Exile all cards from all opponents' hands and graveyards.

cards.name: Battlewise Hoplite
cards.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlewise Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Battlewise Hoplite, then scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.
cards.name: Chronicler of Heroes
cards.text: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Daxos of Meletis
cards.text:
Daxos of Meletis can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Whenever Daxos of Meletis deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

cards.flavor:
"Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn."
—Xenagos, the Reveler
cards.name: Destructive Revelry
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

cards.name: Fleecemane Lion
cards.text:
{3}{G}{W}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Fleecemane Lion is monstrous, it has hexproof and indestructible.

cards.name: Horizon Chimera
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying, trample
Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: A warcaller merely brings the herd together. After that, the meat-hunger is all the encouragement they need.
cards.name: Kragma Warcaller
cards.text:
Minotaur creatures you control have haste.
Whenever a Minotaur you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Medomai the Ageless
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Medomai the Ageless deals combat damage to a player, take an extra turn after this one.
Medomai the Ageless can't attack during extra turns.

cards.flavor: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."
cards.name: Pharika's Mender
cards.text: When Pharika's Mender enters the battlefield, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Polis Crusher
cards.text:
Trample, protection from enchantments
{4}{R}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
Whenever Polis Crusher deals combat damage to a player, if Polis Crusher is monstrous, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

cards.flavor: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."
cards.name: Prophet of Kruphix
cards.text:
Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature cards as though they had flash.

cards.name: Psychic Intrusion
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

cards.name: Reaper of the Wilds
cards.text:
Whenever another creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{B}: Reaper of the Wilds gains deathtouch until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Reaper of the Wilds gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.flavor: When Athreos gathers the newly dead to be ferried across the Five Rivers That Ring the World, he sends skeletal griffins to fetch those who stray.
cards.name: Sentry of the Underworld
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
{W}{B}, Pay 3 life: Regenerate Sentry of the Underworld.

cards.flavor: Her melody melds death and beauty with such artistry that even the gods weep to hear it.
cards.name: Shipwreck Singer
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{U}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks this turn if able.
{1}{B}, {T}: Attacking creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Thaumaturges remain silent around chimeras, lest their words conjure even stranger beasts.
cards.name: Spellheart Chimera
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Spellheart Chimera's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Keranos is a fickle god, delivering punishment as readily as prophecy.
cards.name: Steam Augury
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Triad of Fates
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Put a fate counter on another target creature.
{W}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{B}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it. Its controller draws two cards.

cards.flavor: His memories remained in the Underworld, but his cruelty crossed the Rivers with him.
cards.name: Tymaret, the Murder King
cards.text:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Tymaret, the Murder King deals 2 damage to target player.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Tymaret from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Underworld Cerberus
cards.text:
Underworld Cerberus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
When Underworld Cerberus dies, exile it and each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

cards.name: Xenagos, the Reveler
cards.text:
+1: Add X mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures you control.
0: Put a 2/2 red and green Satyr creature token with haste onto the battlefield.
−6: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Akroan Horse
cards.text:
Defender
When Akroan Horse enters the battlefield, an opponent gains control of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent puts a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"I know its lightness, for I have seen it fly. I know its weight, for I have seen it strike."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis
cards.name: Anvilwrought Raptor
cards.text: Flying, first strike

cards.flavor:
The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened.
—The Theriad
cards.name: Bronze Sable

cards.flavor: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.
cards.name: Burnished Hart
cards.text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Colossus of Akros
cards.text:
Defender, indestructible
{10}: Monstrosity 10. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Colossus of Akros is monstrous, it has trample and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

cards.flavor: Beware the gifts of an ill-tempered forge god.

cards.text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Flamecast Wheel: Flamecast Wheel deals 3 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor:
"The gods gave us no wings to fly, but they gave us an even greater gift: imagination."

cards.flavor: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.
cards.name: Guardians of Meletis

cards.flavor: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.
